text: The Sehol X6 is a compact Crossover SUV made by JAC Motors under the Sehol brand. It is built on the same platform as the JAC Refine S5 and was introduced as an updated model for the Sehol lineup. == History == The Sehol X6 was first shown to the public at the 2022 Beijing Auto Show. Early in its development, it was planned to be named the Sehol X5. The X6 shares its design with other Sehol models but has a unique front design. It is positioned below the Sehol QX and above the Sehol X4 in Seholâ€™s product lineup. == Features == The Sehol X6 has a 1.5-liter turbocharged four-cylinder petrol engine that produces 150 horsepower and 210 Nm of torque. It is assembled in Hefei, China, and is also produced in Bam, Iran, under the name KMC X5. The vehicle has a five-door body style. == References == Category:Chinese automobiles Category:2020s automobiles
title: Sehol X6
